events.name: TimCon Duel Cast
events.details: Kicking off the cast to this wonderful duel event with Haymo. $1500 USD in prizes on the line for the players. After 1.5 hours we will be handing over to some other lovely casters.

events.name: Kuachi Cups November Circuit Finals
events.details: The final bracket from the November Diabotical 3v3 tournament.
